sourcesContent:
import axios from "axios" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" export default function Users(){ function deleteUsers(iduser){ axios.delete(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/user/delete/${iduser}`) } const [users,setusers]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/user/show") .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>setusers(data)) },[]) const ShowUsers=users.map((user,index)=> {index+1} {user.name} {user.email} deleteUsers(user.id)} className="fa-solid fa-trash"style={{color:"red",cursor:"pointer"}}> ) return(
Id Users Email Acction
) }
